metadata.title: CVE-2011-3620 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Qpid 0.12 does not properly verify credentials during the joining ofa cluster, which allows remote attackers to obtain access to the messagingfunctionality and job functionality of a cluster by leveraging knowledge ofa cluster-username.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
